talents.name: Hold Fast
talents.description: When deployed Troop counterattacks, there is a 15% chance to grant them a shield (Shield Factor 600) for 2s. Triggers up to 1 time every 4s.

talents.name: Tit for Tat
talents.description: When deployed Troop receives Active Skill Damage, deals 1 instance of direct damage (Damage Factor 500) to the target Troop. If your own Troop does not have a shield, they take 30% less damage for 1s. Triggers up to 1 time every 1s.

talents.name: Determined Defense
talents.description: When deployed Troop receives a basic attack, there is a 20% chance to deal 1 instance of direct damage (Damage Factor 300) to the target Troop, and heal your own Troop (Heal Factor 300). If your own Troop has a shield, the target Troop also takes the damage.

skills.name: Authoritative Suppression
skills.description: Deals 1 instance of direct damage (Damage Factor 1325) to the target Troop, and heals own Troop (Heal Factor 310).

awakening.name: Vanquishing Blade
awakening.description: Deals 1 instance of direct damage (Damage Factor 1700) to the target Troop, heals own Troop (Heal Factor 400), and reduces damage taken by 10% for 2s.

skills.name: Zeal
skills.description: When deployed Troop receives healing, there is a 20% chance to deal 1 instance of direct damage (Damage Factor 750) to the target Troop, and a 20% chance to randomly Purify 1 debuff from your own Troop. Triggers up to 1 time every 3s.

talents.name: Heroic Blessing
talents.description: Triggers when entering battle, reduces deployed Troop’s Counterattack Damage by 30% for 30s. After 30s, increases their Burn Damage by 15%. This Buff cannot be removed and will last until the end of the battle.

talents.name: Battle Hymn
talents.description: Deals 1 instance of direct damage (Damage Factor 800) to the target every 9s. When your deployed Troops’ Rage is lower than the target, they restore 50 Rage.

talents.name: Flame’s Judgment
talents.description: If the target is Burning, there is a 30% chance for deployed Troops to deal direct damage 1 time (Damage Factor 1000) to the target when triggering a Command Skill.

skills.name: Flame Slash
skills.description: Deals 1 instance of direct damage to the target (Damage Factor 560) and inflicts them with Burn. Burning enemies will take continuous damage every second (Damage Factor 245) for 4s.

awakening.name: Desperate Strike
awakening.description: Deals 1 instance of direct damage (Damage Factor 800) to the target and inflicts them with Burning. Burning enemies will take continuous damage every second (Damage Factor 350) for 4s.

skills.name: Blade’s Judgment
skills.description: Deals 1 instance of direct damage to the target every 9s (Damage Factor 240) and inflicts them with Burn. Burning enemies will take continuous damage every second (Damage Factor 240) for 3s.
